title: 13 Purchase property with a house and a pool for sale in Colombo 5
details:
13 purchase road front property with a 12 year old house with a pool for sale in Kirula Road Colombo 05.

House has large 2 livings, dining pantry, 5 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms with more than 5000 sqft. Parking for 2 vehicles available in side the premises.

Expected price LKR 168 million

Please call on 0777362600 or 0777878138 for inspections.
